TEXT.TITLE: JAPAN BUYS UP TO 8,000 TONNES CANADIAN RAPESEED
TEXT.BODY: Japanese crushers bought 5,000 to 8,000 tonnes of Canadian rapeseed for last-half May/first-half June shipment, trade sources said. Price details were not available. Reuter
